name: Last Ninja IV
overview: Last Ninja IV is an unreleased prototype (playable demo) game for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Jon Wells and Paul "Feekzoid" Hannay. The game was proposed to System 3, however they were not interested as they decided to no longer support the 8-bit computers, and focus on the ST and Amiga. The playable demo was released in 1994.
